channel.title: How do i make ::pickup admin only?
channel.description: I read a few guides.. And what i tried didn't seem to do the trick. Im trying to make ::pickup admin only. I really need help on this, As it ruined my server.

item.title: How do i make ::pickup admin only?
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple MrPurple
item.description:
@MrPurple wrote:

Actually its if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 2)
0 = normal player
1 = MOD
2 = admin
3 = owner
Just so u know

-MrPurple

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make ::pickup admin only?

item.title: How do i make ::pickup admin only?
item.dc:creator: @_MOAD `MOAD
item.description:
@_MOAD wrote:

You’ll probably have the first line of the if-statement be similar or exactly this;

if(command.startsWith("pickup"))

Make the first line

if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make ::pickup admin only?
